content: Had my interview with the quant firm today. Felt like I was back in Tokyo, navigating a new world with no map. But this time, I'm ready to chart my own course. Fingers crossed!

At 22, I'm piecing together the puzzle of my future. The interview with the quant firm was a big step, but now I'm thinking about how $XVI fits into my journey. Is this the innovation I'm meant to be part of?
